summary: the aim of our study was to clinically and etiologically investigate acute outbreaks of respiratory disease in Finland. a total of 20 case herds had finishing pigs showing acute respiratory symptoms and eight control herds showing no clinical signs suggesting respiratory problems were enrolled in the study. no resistance against florfenicol, enrofloxacin, tulathromycin or tiamulin was found. APP was the most common cause for acute respiratory outbreaks.
